Reviews.Title: Some technical problems after a few months of use
Reviews.Author: Laura Grace
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a few months now, and I really like it. However, I am not sure it will last much longer. It is a little flakey sometimes. When I am walking around in a building I tend to get really bad service. Also, when I get texts, it only vibrates 90% of the time, the other times the screen only lights up to tell me I have a text. Page plus is cheap, but the cell service isn't great. My calls often break up, and sometimes it is hard to hear the other person.

Reviews.Title: Kool phone
Reviews.Author: agustin
Reviews.Content: Works just great, nice and light. wish it was mp3 playable. Would definitely recommend to my friends. Well worth my money.

Reviews.Title: Cheaper at Websight
Reviews.Author: Ryan_81
Reviews.Content: The phone is only $49 on the page plus websight. I would look else where before buying, you can get a better deal.[...]
